abstract: Police in Essex, Great Britain, announce arrest of suspect in his 80s in fatal shooting of fellow nursing home resident Rita King.
lead_paragraph: A man in his 80s was arrested Monday, suspected of fatally shooting an 81-year-old woman who was a fellow nursing home resident.

headline.main: Britain: Man Is Suspected of Killing Relative at Essex Nursing Home
headline.print_headline: Europe; Britain: Man Is Suspected of Killing Relative at Essex Nursing Home

snippet: A man in his 80s was arrested Monday, suspected of fatally shooting an 81-year-old woman who was a fellow nursing home resident.
